mobility.summary: Quadruped robot with four legs each having three revolute joints (hip, upper leg, lower leg). Capable of traversing uneven terrain and potentially moving between floors.

perception.summary: Equipped with a fixed head camera. Adequately suited for single-floor object perception tasks.

manipulation.summary: Single arm with eight revolute joints for complex movements. End effector at the wrist includes a flexible finger for versatile manipulation tasks. Suitable for object pick and place operations.
